lead_paragraph: When Samantha Abbott begins her final semester teaching science at a Chicago high school, she faces some unexpected news -- she is pregnant. Soon after, Samantha learns that one of her favorite students, Jasmine, has landed in a similar situation. Following, the two women embark on an unlikely friendship.
